# Test Fixtures

This directory contains minimal test assets for astraweave-asset testing.

## Assets

- `cube.gltf` - Valid GLTF with single cube mesh
- `corrupted.gltf` - Invalid JSON for error testing
- `missing_buffer.gltf` - References non-existent buffer
- `test.png` - 2x2 test texture
- Symlinks/copies to real assets from assets/models and assets/materials
